com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface

Class BufferContentProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface.BufferContentProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, HttpAsyncContentProducer

    public class BufferContentProducer
extends Object
implements HttpAsyncContentProducer
    Produces asynchronous content from an IOControlled byte buffer. This class is primarily used to produce the content from a remote target back to a requesting client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferContentProducer

        public BufferContentProducer(BufferIOController buffer,
                             String txId,
                             String role)
        Primary constructor
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer that content will be produced from
        txId - The transaction id that this object is participating in
        role - The roll of this producer (e.g. server, proxy, etc.).

      • produceContent

        public void produceContent(ContentEncoder encoder,
                           IOControl ioctrl)
                    throws IOException
        This method is only called if the response has content (which is typically the case). It flips it's buffer (which some other object has asynchronously written into), reads the response data and encodes it out to the client who requested it.
        Specified by:
        produceContent in interface HttpAsyncContentProducer
        Throws:
        IOException
